attributes.action: Declare the petitions system out of beta
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that the E-Petitions system is declared out of beta, or that the outstanding bugs/problems with the site are published.

rejection.details: Any comments on the e-petitioning system should be sent to: team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
